page.title: 03VILLAGE SERVICES.
page.content: {SHOPS.}A small modern purpose built Super market is on the A443, on the Common.Many homes now use this shop for both their daily and weekly shopping.This mini super market is also most popular with neighbouring villages prefering to shop here rather than journeying to the towns.A small village store is in the old village. This shop also delivers daily newspapers and bread to homes in quite a wide radius of Abberley. {DAIRY.}The Beehive Dairy (local) and the Co-opative stores (Kidderminster) deliver milk daily in the area. {Garages.}A general repair garage (including agriculture) is on the Common. This includes the sales of petrol,diesel and paraffin.It is also a M.O.T.testing station. A much smaller car repair garage is in the village square in the old Smithy.
